Developer Journal

I document most of the things I'm learning as I'm learning them. This includes step by step installation commands, any advice/feedback, article snippets and sources, questions I have etc. Your mind is for having ideas, not for holding them - David Allen.

This site has been purposely published in a raw state to begin with, so that I can share (and discuss) each of the steps in the decision-making process. Also lets me share content without waiting until the site is 'finished'.

Follow Along as I Build this website LIVE from the ground up
